disableGrabbedShipCollision.description: Gravitron will disable collision of grabbed ships against the user.

insteadCreateInteractiveDeployer.description: Disable Create Interactive deployer mixin to use VS Addition's

fakeAirPocket.description: Enable fake air pocket. This feature may frequently change, potentially causing damage to your old save files. Please consider enabling it with caution.

maxTiltAngle.description: Maximum tilt angle (in degrees) at which an entity can stand on a ship.
